name: Ashley's Asylum Chapter 2 (The Dead Forest)
description:
Ashley's Asylum

Ashley's Asylum is a Trilogy of reskins mods that suppose to make some form of story that kinda make sense.... Maybe...

After Escaping the asylum from Chapter 1, You got into your truck and drove away. You stopped into the Forest to hide from Ashley. But, Ashley and her crew knew where you're hiding. Can you keep the fire alive while avoiding Ashley's Minions? Download the 2nd Chapter to find out.

Returning:

Ashley (Now in her Phase 2 Form)

Hugh Neutron

Peter the Thot Destroyer

ScrapTrap (Cameo) (Lost in the Forest somewhere)

Newcomers:

Toadette (Behind the 4th Wall)

Meme Man

NOTE:

I was gonna remove Baldi's Lines, but due to an Error that happened with UnityEX, I decided not to. Deal With it.
